sentences.english: Dangerous rock is a main geological hazard in the reservoir area of the Three Gorges Project, especially in Wanzhou area.
sentences.chinese: 三峽庫區危巖災害極其發育，萬州地區具有代表性。

sentences.english: Chongqing Wanzhou Steel Bridge Repair anti-corrosion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 重慶萬州大橋鋼結構維修防腐工程。

sentences.english: The example to introduce grass carp baked method of making Wanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 本幢救嗽草魚爲例引見萬州烤魚地製造辦法。

sentences.english: Thousands of passengers have been stranded at the Wanzhou railway station.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬名旅客被困在萬州火車站。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 is about construction of the long-term mechanism to increase Wanzhou farmers.
sentences.chinese: 第四章爲萬州農民增收長效機制的構建。

sentences.english: This article takes Wanzhou district of Chongqing as the main study subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文以重慶市萬州區爲主要研究對象。
